item.description:
Please come out next week for a rehearsal open to all interested members! Together with the current cast, we will talk improv, practice several drills/warmups, and perform a variety of games. This rehearsal will also serve as preparation for upcoming performances at a homeless shelter, hospital, and other possible venues.

If you are curious about what we do, are intrigued by the idea of volunteer comedy, and enjoy improvisation, come out!

See you soon,
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Open Rehearsal
